{"fares":[{"fare":"PZZOW","airline_fil":"IQ","airline_market":"IQ","city_depart":"ALA","city_arrive":"TSE"}],"rules":[[{"rule_code":"RU","rule_title":"RULE APPLICATION","rule_text":" ONE WAY YOUTH FARE APPLICATION AREA WITHIN KAZAKHSTAN CLASS OF SERVICE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS OF SERVICE. TYPES OF JOURNEY THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY FARES. MAY BE USED TO CREATE OW JOURNEYS.
"},{"rule_code":"MX","rule_title":"MAX STAY","rule_text":" NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
"},{"rule_code":"SR","rule_title":"SALES RESTRICT","rule_text":" TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON/AFTER 12JUL2018. BETWEEN AREA 3 AND AREA 3 EXTENSION OF TICKET VALIDITY IS NOT PERMITTED. TICKETS MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN AREA 1/AREA 2/AREA 3. TICKETS MAY NOT BE SOLD IN UZBEKISTAN. OR - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON THE STOCK OF DV OR HR AND MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN UZBEKISTAN. EXTENSION OF TICKET VALIDITY IS NOT PERMITTED.
"},{"rule_code":"TR","rule_title":"TVL RESTRICTION","rule_text":" VALID FOR TRAVEL COMMENCING ON/AFTER 12JUL2018.
"},{"rule_code":"AP","rule_title":"ADVANCE RES/TKT","rule_text":" TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 1 HOUR AFTER RESERVATIONS ARE MADE. ALL SECTORS MUST BE CONFIRMED. NOTE - TICKETING PERMITTED ONLY WITH HK-STATUS ON ALL SEGMENTS. NOTE- ISSUANCE OF TICKETS WITH OPEN DATE IS NOT PERMITTED. ------------------------------- FARE IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE AND NOT GUARANTEED UNTIL TICKETING. --------------------------------------------- DUE TO AUTOMATED TICKETING DEADLINE CONTROL DIFFERENCE COULD EXIST BETWEEN THE FARE RULE LAST TICKETING DATE AND THE SYSTEM GENERATED TICKETING DEADLINE MESSAGE. THE MORE RESTRICTIVE TICKETING DEADLINE APPLIES. CONTACT/PAX HOME/MOBILE NUMBER/TRAVEL AGENCY NUMBER MUST BE ADDED TO PNR. OTHERWISE AGENT PAYS PENALTY.
"},{"rule_code":"PE","rule_title":"PENALTIES","rule_text":" Y - Универсальный Правила тарифов Перебронирование: Разрешается без удержания; Возврат: Разрешается без удержания; Неявка на рейс: Разрешается без удержания; Период максимального пребывания - 12 Месяцев; Бесплатная норма провоза багажа - 20КГ; Комбинация тарифов: Разрешено; Изменение маршрута: Не разрешено; Повышение тарифа:Разрешен в пределах группы Универсальный. Возможна доплата разницы до доступного уровня тарифа на момент обмена билета."},{"rule_code":"FL","rule_title":"FLT APPLICATION","rule_text":" THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING ANY DV FLIGHT. NOTE - TICKETS ARE VALID FOR TRANSPORTATION ONLY IN STRICT SEQUENCE OF FLIGHT COUPONS. INCONSEQUENTLY USED FLIGHT COUPONS MAKE AIR TICKET INVALID FOR FURTHER TRANSPORTATION.
"},{"rule_code":"CD","rule_title":"CHILD DISCOUNTS","rule_text":"NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT APPLY. THERE IS NO DISCOUNT FOR AN ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-14 YEARS OF AGE. NOTE - ------------------------------------------------- OR- UNACCOMPANIED CHILD- TRAVEL NOT PERMITTED AT THIS FARE. ------------------------------------------------- OR - AN INFANT UNDER 2 YEARS OF AGE AND NOT OCCUPYING A SEAT - ID REQUIRED - WILL TRAVEL FREE OF CHARGE. TICKET DESIGNATOR- IN00 MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS BY ADULT 18 OR OLDER. NOTE - PROOF OF AGE/AS EVIDENCED BY A PASSPORT ETC/MUST BE PRESENTED AT THE TIME OF TICKETING. COPY OF THE APPROPRIATE DOCUMENT MUST BE AFFIXED TO THE AUDIT COUPON WHEN ANY DISCOUNT APPLIES. OR - THERE IS NO DISCOUNT FOR AN INFANT UNDER 2 YEARS OF AGE AND OCCUPYING A SEAT - ID REQUIRED. NOTE - PROOF OF AGE/ AS EVIDENCED BY A PASSPORT ETC/ MUST BE PRESENTED AT THE TIME OF TICKETING. COPY OF THE APPROPRIATE DOCUMENT/PROOF OF AGE/ MUST BE AFFIXED TO THE AUDIT COUPON WHEN ANY DISCOUNT APPLIES. ------------------------------------ NOTE - UNACCOMPANIED INFANT - TRAVEL NOT PERMITTED. ------------------------------------
"},{"rule_code":"OD","rule_title":"OTHER DISCOUNTS","rule_text":" NOTE - NO DISCOUNTS APPLIED
"},{"rule_code":"SO","rule_title":"STOPOVERS","rule_text":" UNLIMITED FREE STOPOVERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT.
"},{"rule_code":"SU","rule_title":"SURCHARGES","rule_text":" IF INFANT UNDER 2 YEARS OF AGE WITH ID AND NOT OCCUPYING A SEAT THERE IS NO SURCHARGE PER FARE COMPONENT PER INFANT. THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON THE STOCK OF DV OR HR. THERE IS NO SURCHARGE PER FARE COMPONENT. THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON THE STOCK OF DV OR PS. THERE IS NO SURCHARGE PER FARE COMPONENT. THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON THE STOCK OF DV OR GP. THERE IS NO SURCHARGE PER FARE COMPONENT. THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON THE STOCK OF DV OR UT. THERE IS NO SURCHARGE PER FARE COMPONENT. OTHERWISE A SURCHARGE OF USD 10.00 WILL BE ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE SURCHARGE APPLIES PER ADULT/CHILD/INFANT. INFANT IS FREE.
"},{"rule_code":"EL","rule_title":"ELIGIBILITY","rule_text":" VALID FOR YOUTH CONFIRMED 15-25 YEARS OF AGE WITH ID. NOTE - UNACCOMPANIED INFANT NOT ELIGIBLE TO TRAVEL. DATE OF BIRTH MUST BE ENTERED IN TICKET AFTER PASSENGER NAME. DOCUMENTATION - PROOF OF AGE- PASSPORT OR ID- MUST BE PRESENTED AT TIME OF TICKETING. COPY OF THIS DOCUMENT MUST BE ATTACHED TO ACCOUNT.
"}]]}
